name: Dragon Pet Care & Dress up - Dragon Egg Hatching
name_original: Dragon Pet Care & Dress up - Dragon Egg Hatching
description:
Dragon Pet Caring & Dress Up is a new addition to dragon care games. Learn how to bring up training and care for little dragons in this new dragon care game. Meet the baby dragons & grow them up. Be the ultimate dragon trainer. Start with caring of dragons magic eggs by keeping it at proper temperature & providing it with the best climate giving it sufficient warmth and sunlight & saving it from cold till it hatches have ultimate fun with dragon egg hatching first.Once it hatches into a virtual baby dragon pet. Start caring of dragons & spend wonderful time with the baby feed it proper food, play and train the baby till it grows up into a big dragon. Train & feed your cute baby dragons and evolve them into the most strong and impressive beast.

Game Play & Features:
Learn dragon egg hatching in real time.
2 amazing dragon characters.
Eye popping visuals with the ultimate dragon care skills training.
Feed & cuddle the little dragon pets, care for them.
Dress up your dragon pet with tons of cool outfits.

Want to raise your very own dragon then download this amazing dragon care game and enjoy!
